extension_description.message: Detect any page video and mirror it to your Feel tab via WebRTC. Highlight sources and stream with one click from the popup.

popup_subtitle.message: Select a video on this page to stream via WebRTC.

popup_status_no_videos.message: No playable videos detected on this page.

popup_status_no_active_tab.message: Unable to detect the active tab.

errors_feel_tab_cannot_source.message: The Feel tab cannot be used as a source.

errors_highlight_not_allowed.message: Cannot highlight videos within the Feel tab.

errors_feel_tab_required.message: No Feel tab registered. Please open $1.

errors_video_not_found.message: Video not found. Try refreshing the page.

errors_video_uncapturable.message: This video cannot be captured. Try using a different source.

errors_open_feel_tab_failed.message: Failed to open the Feel The Dance tab automatically.

errors_feel_tab_loading.message: The Feel The Dance tab is still loading. Please open $1 manually.

errors_missing_target_tab.message: Missing target tab for WebRTC offer.

errors_no_pending_session.message: No pending session available for an answer.

errors_no_active_session.message: No active session found for ICE exchange.

errors_gateway_unavailable.message: WebRTC gateway unavailable at $1. Please start f8webrtc_gateway_service.
